summary: SummaryLancome's rich, luscious Absolue Rose 80 Cleansing Balm-To-Foam removes makeup and impurities, leaving skin perfectly clean, smooth, and refined. This cleanser does not leave the skin oily/greasy after washing off, rather, skin is left feeling fresher and looking balanced.
details: DetailsKey Ingredients80% Rose EmulsionResearch Results97% agree product feels gentle on the skin*95% agree product leaves skin feeling perfectly clean & clear*94% agree product leaves skin feeling comfortable after washing off*91% agree skin feels fresher*97% agree skin feels fresher**92% agree product gives the skin a healthy glow**92% agree skin feels comfortable***Based on immediate results in a consumer test of 64 women**Based on 4-week results in a consumer test of 64 womenItem 2632955How To UseMorning: Use this cleansing balm daily to cleanse skin before applying other skincare and makeup products.Evening: Use this cleansing balm daily to remove makeup before applying other treatment products.Pick up a generous amount of balm. Transfer to fingertips and melt into cream. Apply creamy balm to dry skin with your fingertips. Add warm water and massage into rich foam. For increased microcirculation, massage into skin using circular motions.Rinse well with warm water. Pat dry.IngredientsGlycerin, Aqua/Water/Eau, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Sodium Stearate, Coconut Acid, Palmitic Acid, Stearic Acid, Coco-Glucoside, Glyceryl Stearate, Sodium Chloride, 1,2-Hexanediol, Rosa Damascena Flower Water, Sodium Isethionate, Arginine, Propanediol, Citric Acid, Ethylhexylglycerin, Tocopherol, Salicylic Acid, Ci 17200/Red 33, Ci 19140/Yellow 5, Parfum/Fragrance.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Morning: Use this cleansing balm daily to cleanse skin before applying other skincare and makeup products.Evening: Use this cleansing balm daily to remove makeup before applying other treatment products.Pick up a generous amount of balm. Transfer to fingertips and melt into cream. Apply creamy balm to dry skin with your fingertips. Add warm water and massage into rich foam. For increased microcirculation, massage into skin using circular motions.Rinse well with warm water. Pat dry.

reviews.headline: Sublime
reviews.comments: Worth every penny.  You need so little.  Cleans without stripping.  I love everything Lanc√¥me.
